sections.Overview: 'The Wild Hogs' is a universe, a way of thinking, and a collection of characters, places, and events. Key characters include [the-wrangler] and The Reverend (Of Tinsel Town).
The Wrangler is a resident of [tinsel-town].
sections.Early Life: The Wrangler was born in [tinsel-town] in 1955.

sections.Overview: Tinsel Town is a settlement in Kansas, USA. It is north east of Great Bend and Hoisington, south of [russel] and [bunker-hill].
City north of [tinsel-town] in which [bunker-brew] is made, the most popular drink in [tinsel-town], sold exclusively in the [tinsel-town-tavern].
City north of [tinsel-town] where many old folks retire.
Highway connecting Great Bend and Hoisington with [russel]. Passes by [tinsel-town].
Home of [the-wrangler], located 2 miles west of [tinsel-town].
The Tinsel Town Tavern (or 'Triple T') is the sole pub of [tinsel-town].
The most popular drink in [tinsel-town]. Brewed in [bunker-hill].
